Live blog

This is a live-*ish blog. It gets updated quite frequently when I go for travel or on an event. Its more or less like a Twitter feed, but I wanted to build this because it allows me to have customizations and the most awesome part there's no word limit.

There is no live event at the moment. You may want to sit back and enjoy one of the past events in meantime.
